alert.note: Alert for Schoharie; Western Albany (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northwestern Albany and central Schoharie Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower with strong gusty winds over Middleburgh, or 9 miles southeast of Cobleskill, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cobleskill, Berne, Middleburgh, Schoharie, Richmondville, North Blenheim, Breakabeen, Central Bridge, Knox, Carlisle, Esperance, East Berne, West Richmondville, West Berne, Huntersland, Warnerville, Broome Center, Becker Corners, West Fulton and Shutts Corners. This includes Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
